languages.text: {n}Посторонний шипящий звук на мгновение привлекает ваше внимание. Спустя секунду вы понимаете: Паскаль негромко читает бинарную молитву.{/n}
{n}An otherworldly hissing sound diverts your attention for a moment. A second later, you realise that Pasqal is softly intoning a binharic prayer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Посторонний шипящий звук на мгновение привлекает ваше внимание. Спустя секунду вы понимаете: Паскаль негромко читает бинарную молитву.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}An otherworldly hissing sound diverts your attention for a moment. A second later, you realise that Pasqal is softly intoning a binharic prayer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un sonido sobrenatural distrae tu atención por un momento. Al cabo de un segundo te das cuenta de que es Pasqal, entonando suavemente una plegaria en binario.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An otherworldly hissing sound diverts your attention for a moment. A second later, you realise that Pasqal is softly intoning a binharic prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sonido sobrenatural distrae tu atención por un momento. Al cabo de un segundo te das cuenta de que es Pasqal, entonando suavemente una plegaria en binario.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}異世界のうなるような音が耳に入り、一瞬だけ集中力が途切れる。すぐに、音の正体はビンハリックの讃美歌を優しく奏でるパスカルであることに気づく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An otherworldly hissing sound diverts your attention for a moment. A second later, you realise that Pasqal is softly intoning a binharic prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異世界のうなるような音が耳に入り、一瞬だけ集中力が途切れる。すぐに、音の正体はビンハリックの讃美歌を優しく奏でるパスカルであることに気づく。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}一阵空灵的嘶嘶声暂时转移了你的注意力。片刻之后，你意识到，那是帕斯卡正在低声吟诵一段二进制语祷文。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An otherworldly hissing sound diverts your attention for a moment. A second later, you realise that Pasqal is softly intoning a binharic prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一阵空灵的嘶嘶声暂时转移了你的注意力。片刻之后，你意识到，那是帕斯卡正在低声吟诵一段二进制语祷文。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un sifflement surnaturel détourne un instant votre attention. Une seconde plus tard, vous réalisez que Pasqal chante à voix basse une prière binhaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An otherworldly hissing sound diverts your attention for a moment. A second later, you realise that Pasqal is softly intoning a binharic prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sifflement surnaturel détourne un instant votre attention. Une seconde plus tard, vous réalisez que Pasqal chante à voix basse une prière binhaire.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein fremdartiges Zischen lenkt dich einen kurzen Augenblick lang ab. Eine Sekunde später wird dir klar, dass Pasqal leise ein binhäres Gebet spricht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An otherworldly hissing sound diverts your attention for a moment. A second later, you realise that Pasqal is softly intoning a binharic prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein fremdartiges Zischen lenkt dich einen kurzen Augenblick lang ab. Eine Sekunde später wird dir klar, dass Pasqal leise ein binhäres Gebet spricht.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Âdeta bu dünyaya ait olmayan bir tıslama sesi, dikkatini bir anlığına başka yöne çekiyor. Ardından Pasqal'ın ikilidil bir duayı hafifçe okuduğunu fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An otherworldly hissing sound diverts your attention for a moment. A second later, you realise that Pasqal is softly intoning a binharic prayer.{/n}
